title: Runner-up at World Cup tournaments by country 1930 to 2014
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of runners-up for 10 number of Countrys.
Country Germany has the highest Number of runners-up and France has the lowest Number of runners-up.
The highest Country Germany has 3.0 more Number of runners-up than the lowest Country France.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Number of runners-up in the y axis.
The Number of runners-up is appeared to be the highest at Country Germany and lowest at Country France.
